Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 4 Indriyasaṃyutta » 4.7 Bodhipakkhiyavagga
4.7.10 Catuttharukkhasutta
Indriyasaṃyutta
Bodhipakkhiyavagga
Catuttharukkhasutta
540.
1248“Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—  bodhāya. Katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyā dhammā? Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati…pe…  paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—  bodhāyā”ti.
1249Dasamaṃ.
1250Bodhipakkhiyavaggo sattamo.
1251Tassuddānaṃ
1252
Saṃyojanā anusayā,
pariññā āsavakkhayā;
Dve phalā caturo rukkhā,
vaggo tena pavuccatīti.
